alert.note: Alert for Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 1:46PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SUWANNEE COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM EST... At 146 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dowling Park to 7 miles west of Luraville to 9 miles west of Mayo. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Dowling Park, Mcalpin, Luraville, Newburn, and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
